content.rendered:
Individuals working in the field of system management, network and information security should have information about cyber attacks, both individually and institutionally. In this training, logical and hardware security solutions that can be applied to protect against cyber attacks, legal processes and cyber attacks are covered.

 

Every individual working in institutions should have a good level of awareness in the field of cyber security and information security. 80% of successful attacks against companies are from inside. In other words, every individual should have cyber security awareness in order to be protected from attacks caused by the mistakes of company personnel. The content in this training has been prepared completely in accordance with this.
